item.title: Competitive programming with python

Resources for CP with python:- Approach for solving a problem One important noteüìù Some cool programming questions Why python for competitive programmingü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è? There are many programming languages with which one can approach to solve CP problems but in this blog we will focus on python and also some reasons why python can be a good choice for programming .
